# EC2 Security Best Practices

## Objective
Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```

# EC2 Security Best Practices

## Objective
Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```

- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [

    }
  ]
  egress = [

      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}

Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```

# EC2 Security Best Practices

## Objective
Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```

- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [

    }
  ]
  egress = [

      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}

Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```

# EC2 Security Best Practices

## Objective
Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```

- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [

    }
  ]
  egress = [

      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}

Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```

# EC2 Security Best Practices

## Objective
Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```

- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [

    }
  ]
  egress = [

      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}

Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```

# EC2 Security Best Practices

## Objective
Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```

- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [

    }
  ]
  egress = [

      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}

Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```

# EC2 Security Best Practices

## Objective
Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```

- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [

    }
  ]
  egress = [

      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}

Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```

# EC2 Security Best Practices

## Objective
Harden EC2 instances and secure access to them.

## Recommendations
- Use hardened and up-to-date AMIs.
- Restrict SSH access using security groups.
- Enable CloudWatch for monitoring and alerting.

## Example
```hcl
resource "aws_instance" "secure_ec2" {
  ami           = "ami-12345678"
  instance_type = "t3.micro"

  monitoring = true

  vpc_security_group_ids = [aws_security_group.ec2_sg.id]
}

resource "aws_security_group" "ec2_sg" {
  name_prefix = "ec2-secure-"
  description = "Allow SSH only from specific IP"
  ingress = [
    {
      from_port   = 22
      to_port     = 22
      protocol    = "tcp"
      cidr_blocks = ["203.0.113.0/24"]
    }
  ]
  egress = [
    {
      from_port   = 0
      to_port     = 0
      protocol    = "-1"
      cidr_blocks = ["0.0.0.0/0"]
    }
  ]
}
```
